entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:01 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
